response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is valued at $15,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to appreciate your interest and commitment. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 12000}
